name: AR Pocket Golf King: Friendly Multiplayer
name_original: AR Pocket Golf King: Friendly Multiplayer
description:
AR Pocket Golf is our unique take on multiplayer Augmented Reality games :)

What you will find here is an early release of the game which features gameplay for 1 or more players - and the possibility to create your own levels to GOLF AMOK!

We hope you will check it out and leave us some input to work on! Support if you like :) Cheers!
